name: Race Car Star! Limit Speed
description:
Race Car Star! Limit Speed
Drive the fastest sports cars of the world at extreme speed and feel the asphalt of the track burning! Drive like a real professional racer to leave your furious rivals behind! Feel the competition and speed boost your car to the finish line!
Take control of luxury licensed cars in real asphalt road. Only racing for speed to racers, fire up your car and be the first to cross the finish line!
Features:
.Real car racing game
.Racer need for speed only
.Drift car with fast speed
.Control left or right to avoid coming car
.HD graphics
